description:
If you´re looking for a course that teach you at the same time PSD to WordPress Theme Development, Mobile First Design, Custom Post Types and Custom Fields for WordPress, this course is for you!

WordPress powers 25% of the websites in the world, knowing WordPress Theme Development is a key skill this days, you will be able to develop your own themes by the end of this course.

More than 11 hours of tips, tricks and techniques for WordPress theme development in one course, Plus:

  • 2 Themes to Develop
  • 13 PSD files to Convert
  • Understand what´re Custom Post Types, Custom Fields, use the Widgets API
  • You can ask me anything about WordPress Theme Development
title: Photoshop / PSD to WordPress Theme Development from Scratch
instructors: Juan Pablo De la torre Valdez
